entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 5:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
